an6.56:1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā phagguno ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
an6.56:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.56:1.4: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā yenāyasmā phagguno tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
an6.56:1.6: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā phagguno tenupasaṅkami.
an6.56:1.7: Addasā kho āyasmā phagguno bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
an6.56:1.9: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ phaggunaṃ etadavoca:
an6.56:1.11: Santimāni āsanāni parehi paññattāni, tatthāhaṃ nisīdissāmī”ti.
an6.56:1.13: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ phaggunaṃ etadavoca:
an6.56:2.1: “Kacci te, phagguna, khamanīyaṃ kacci yāpanīyaṃ? Kacci te dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati, no abhikkamo”ti?
an6.56:2.2: “Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
an6.56:3.1: Seyyathāpi, bhante, balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya; evamevaṃ kho me, bhante, adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.
an6.56:3.2: Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
an6.56:4.1: Seyyathāpi, bhante, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīsaveṭhanaṃ dadeyya; evamevaṃ kho me, bhante, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.
an6.56:4.2: Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
an6.56:5.1: Seyyathāpi, bhante, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṃ parikanteyya; evamevaṃ kho me, bhante, adhimattā vātā kucchiṃ parikantanti.
an6.56:5.2: Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
an6.56:6.1: Seyyathāpi, bhante, dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṃ purisaṃ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṃ samparitāpeyyuṃ; evamevaṃ kho me, bhante, adhimatto kāyasmiṃ ḍāho.
an6.56:6.2: Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo”ti.
an6.56:6.3: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ phaggunaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an6.56:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā phagguno acirapakkantassa bhagavato kālamakāsi.
an6.56:7.2: Tamhi cassa samaye maraṇakāle indriyāni vippasīdiṃsu.
an6.56:7.3: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.56:7.5: Tamhi cassa samaye maraṇakāle indriyāni vippasīdiṃsū”ti.
an6.56:8.1: “Kiṃ hānanda, phaggunassa bhikkhuno indriyāni na vippasīdissanti.
an6.56:8.2: Phaggunassa, ānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ avimuttaṃ ahosi.
an6.56:8.3: Tassa taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ.
an6.56:9.1: Chayime, ānanda, ānisaṃsā kālena dhammassavane kālena atthupaparikkhāya.
an6.56:9.3: Idhānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ avimuttaṃ hoti.
an6.56:9.4: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle labhati tathāgataṃ dassanāya.
an6.56:9.5: Tassa tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti.
an6.56:9.6: Tassa taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ vimuccati.
an6.56:9.7: Ayaṃ, ānanda, paṭhamo ānisaṃso kālena dhammassavane. (1)
an6.56:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, ānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ avimuttaṃ hoti.
an6.56:10.2: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle na heva kho labhati tathāgataṃ dassanāya, api ca kho tathāgatasāvakaṃ labhati dassanāya.
an6.56:10.3: Tassa tathāgatasāvako dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti.
an6.56:10.4: Tassa taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ vimuccati.
an6.56:10.5: Ayaṃ, ānanda, dutiyo ānisaṃso kālena dhammassavane. (2)
an6.56:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, ānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ avimuttaṃ hoti.
an6.56:11.2: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle na heva kho labhati tathāgataṃ dassanāya, napi tathāgatasāvakaṃ labhati dassanāya;
an6.56:11.3: api ca kho yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
an6.56:11.4: Tassa yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato manasānupekkhato pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ vimuccati.
an6.56:11.5: Ayaṃ, ānanda, tatiyo ānisaṃso kālena atthupaparikkhāya. (3)
an6.56:12.1: Idhānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti, anuttare ca kho upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṃ avimuttaṃ hoti.
an6.56:12.2: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle labhati tathāgataṃ dassanāya.
an6.56:12.3: Tassa tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ …pe… brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti.
an6.56:12.4: Tassa taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṃ vimuccati.
an6.56:12.5: Ayaṃ, ānanda, catuttho ānisaṃso kālena dhammassavane. (4)
an6.56:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, ānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti, anuttare ca kho upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṃ avimuttaṃ hoti.
an6.56:13.2: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle na heva kho labhati tathāgataṃ dassanāya, api ca kho tathāgatasāvakaṃ labhati dassanāya.
an6.56:13.3: Tassa tathāgatasāvako dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ …pe… parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti.
an6.56:13.4: Tassa taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṃ vimuccati.
an6.56:13.5: Ayaṃ, ānanda, pañcamo ānisaṃso kālena dhammassavane. (5)
an6.56:14.1: Puna caparaṃ, ānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṃyojanehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti, anuttare ca kho upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṃ avimuttaṃ hoti.
an6.56:14.2: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle na heva kho labhati tathāgataṃ dassanāya, napi tathāgatasāvakaṃ labhati dassanāya;
an6.56:14.3: api ca kho yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
an6.56:14.4: Tassa yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato manasānupekkhato anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṃ vimuccati.
an6.56:14.5: Ayaṃ, ānanda, chaṭṭho ānisaṃso kālena atthupaparikkhāya. (6)
an6.56:15.1: Ime kho, ānanda, cha ānisaṃsā kālena dhammassavane kālena atthupaparikkhāyā”ti.
